remarks: Lemma for ~ ipassi .  By ~ ipasslem5 , ` F ` is 0 for all ` QQ ` ; since it is continuous and ` QQ ` is dense in ` RR ` by ~ qdensere2 , we conclude ` F ` is 0 for all ` RR ` .  (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
